This Privacy Policy describes how Creators Collective, Inc., a Delaware corporation doing business as DIVE Studios (“DIVE Studios”, “we”, “us” or “our”) handles personal information we collect through our digital properties that link to this Privacy Policy, including our websites and the MINDSET by DIVE Studios mobile application and web application (collectively, the "Platform"). us for further information about any such transfers or the specific safeguards applied.
Links to Other Platforms and Services
The Platform may include links to websites or services whose privacy practices may differ from DIVE Studios’ privacy practices as described in this Privacy Policy. When you click or otherwise use a link to an external website or service, the privacy policy and data processing disclosures for that website or service, and not this Privacy Policy, govern.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information, aggregated, anonymized, or pseudonymized information, and uses cookies and tracking technologies to gather data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines the various types of data collected by the app, including personal information, aggregated data, anonymized data, pseudonymized data, and data collected through cookies and tracking technologies.
reply.reference: Personal Information we collect may include: DIVE Studios also collects and maintains aggregated, anonymized, or pseudonymized information to protect the safety and security of the Platform, improve the Platform, or comply with its legal obligations. reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can submit requests via email to support@getmindset.com for exercising their right to information, access, or deletion. Additionally, users can request deletion through the Mindset application by going to the settings menu, account settings, delete account.
reply.reference: You may submit requests to exercise your right to information, access or deletion via email to support@getmindset.com; you can also submit a request to delete through the Mindset application (this can be done by going to the settings menu, account settings, delete account). URL: https://www.getmindset.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with various third parties including business and marketing partners, linked third-party services, professional advisors, authorities, others, and business transferees.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares data with multiple categories of third parties, outlining the specific types such as business and marketing partners, linked third-party services, professional advisors, authorities, and business transferees.
reply.reference: Business and marketing partners. Third parties with whom we co-sponsor events or promotions, with whom we jointly offer products or services, or whose products or services may be of interest to you. Linked third-party services. If you log into the Platform with, or otherwise link your Platform account to, a social media or other third-party services, we may share your personal information with that third-party service. The third party’s use of the shared information will be governed by its privacy policy and the settings associated with your account at the third-party service. Professional advisors. Professional advisors, such as lawyers, auditors, bankers and insurers, where necessary in the course of the professional services that they render to us. Authorities and others. Law enforcement, government authorities, and private parties, as we believe in good faith to be necessary or appropriate for the compliance and protection purposes described above. See the “Information DIVE Studios Shares to Protect DIVE Studios and Comply with the Law” section below for more information regarding how we share personal information with these parties. Business transferees. In the event that DIVE Studios is acquired by or merged with a third-party Person, or sells all or substantially all of its assets, DIVE Studios reserves the right, in any of these circumstances, to transfer or assign to such acquirer the information and content it has collected from Users as part of such merger, acquisition, sale, or other change of control.
